relationships.context: Michael Cain is the president and co-founder of EarthX Film.
EarthX Film is an environmental festival which showcases films and emerging interactive media.
EarthX was founded by Tramble S. Crow in 2011.
Michael believes films could change the world, particularly in environmental issues.
EarthX is the world's largest environmental expo conference which takes place every April in Dallas, Texas.
Luis Sohoyes and his film Race and Extinction.
Michael got involved with films because he believes they could change the world, including films like The Cove.
I ran and started the Dallas Film Society.
EarthX is a division of the nonprofit organization EarthX.
